post.author: kat
post.body:
Just a general comment. If you did all your specular maps like that then that's why the textures appeared shiney in game (mentioned by myself and obsidian over in LEM); you've got to have them pretty much near full black for matt surfaces so depending on the look you're after you want to go the other way and have black as your background and then blend the greyed diffuse over the top.

Nice clear tute.
